other_tests.findings: T score at the spine was –1.4 and –0.6 at the total hip.
other_tests.changes_over_time: BMD decreased from a T score of −1.4 to −2.3 in the spine and −0.6 to −1.0 in the total hip between 2000 and 2005.

other_tests.findings: Multiple tiny infarcts in the brain.
Total hip T score was −0.7, anterior-posterior spine T score was −1.9.
other_tests.changes_over_time: In 2005, total hip T score declined from −0.7 to −1.0 and anterior-posterior spine from −1.9 to −2.3.
